summary: WITHIN ONE WEEK OF PURCHASE THE CONSUMER HAD TO HAVE A NEW TRANSMISSION INSTALLED.  NOW THE BRAKE LIGHTS ILLUMINATED WHEN THE VEHICLE MADE TURNS.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER BUT THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THAT THEY WILL NOT LOOK AT IT BECAUSE THE VEHICLE WAS NOT UNDER WARRANTY.  THE CONSUMER WANTS TO KNOW WHAT SHE CAN DO.  *NLM
